scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "env PORT=3000 npm --prefix take-test-app run start" "npm --prefix api run dev"  "env PORT=3001 npm --prefix reviewer-app run start"
scripts.test: npm --prefix lib run test && npm --prefix take-test-app run test -- --watch-all=false && npm --prefix api run test && npm --prefix reviewer-app run test
scripts.postinstall: (cd take-test-app && yarn install);  (cd reviewer-app && yarn install); (cd lib && yarn install); (cd api && yarn install)
scripts.lib: (npm --prefix lib run build); (cd take-test-app && yarn upgrade abt-lib); (cd reviewer-app && yarn upgrade abt-lib); (cd api && yarn upgrade abt-lib)
